properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 9 at 12:55PM PST until February 9 at 1:45PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in OXNARD has issued a

* Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for...
Central Los Angeles County in southwestern California...

* Until 145 PM PST.

* At 1252 PM PST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to a nearly
stationary thunderstorm. Doppler radar estimated up to 1.00 inch
of rainfall in the last hour. This will cause urban and small
stream flooding in the advisory area.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Pasadena...
Altadena...
Monrovia...
and Sierra Madre.
properties.instruction:
Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small
creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as
well as other drainage areas and low lying spots.

A Flood Advisory means river or stream flows are elevated, or ponding
of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
